changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]Bug fix: images used in this app will no longer appear in the Gallery app. [/b] Sorry for any inconvenience this bug may have caused!

[b]Reader Mode has been added![/b] While browsing an Article or Snippet, you can tap the glasses icon at the top of the screen to disable text input, making for a smooth reading experience without worrying about the keyboard coming up as you scroll. To go back to editing, simply tap the keyboard icon.

[b]World/Article/Snippet names have been marquee'd![/b] If a name is too long to fit onto the screen, the text will automatically scroll to show you the full title. Rejoice, long name enthusiasts![/b]
